tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE cybersecurity_metrics (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  record_date DATE,
  total_attacks INT,
  successful_attacks INT,
  failed_attacks INT,
  malware_detected BOOLEAN,
  vulnerability_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE cybersecurity_metrics (
    id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    metric_name VARCHAR,
    metric_value FLOAT,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE cybersecurity_trends (
    trend_id UUID,
    trend_category VARCHAR,
    trend_date DATE,
    trend_description TEXT,
    trend_status BOOLEAN,
    PRIMARY KEY (trend_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Trends (
    Trend_ID INT,
    Trend_Name VARCHAR(50),
    Trend_Description TEXT,
    Start_Date DATE,
    End_Date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Records (
    Record_ID INT,
    Metric_ID INT,
    Trend_ID INT,
    Record_Date DATE,
    Record_Value FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE users (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 username VARCHAR(50),
 email VARCHAR(100),
 role VARCHAR(50));

CREATE TABLE logs (log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 user_id INT,
 log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
 log_message TEXT);

CREATE TABLE attacks (attack_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 attack_type VARCHAR(50),
 attack_date DATE,
 attack_details JSONB);

CREATE TABLE trends (trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 trend_name VARCHAR(50),
 trend_date DATE,
 trend_description TEXT);

CREATE TABLE vulnerabilities ( 
 vulnerability_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
 vulnerability_type VARCHAR(50), 
 severity VARCHAR(20), 
 reported_by VARCHAR(100), 
 reported_time TIMESTAMP 
);
